tasks.label: build current C file (auto)
args: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop';$file='${file}';$dir='${fileDirname}';$out=Join-Path $dir ('${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe');if (Get-Command clang -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { & clang -g "$file" -o "$out" } elseif (Get-Command gcc -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { & gcc -g "$file" -o "$out" } elseif (Get-Command cl -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Push-Location $dir; & cl /nologo /Zi "${fileBasename}" /Fe"${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe"; Pop-Location } else { Write-Error 'No C compiler found. Install LLVM (clang), MinGW (gcc), or MSVC (cl).'; exit 1 }
